text: Ia arazir aghuibagh amuava Kraisɨn gɨn ghuava, ezɨ me akar kuraba ia mɨgɨava, egh gumazir kaba ian arazir aghuibar gantɨ, da me damutɨ, me uan akar me mɨkemezimɨn aghumsɨzim iniam. Ia me kamaghɨn damusɨ, ia nɨmɨra men akaba ikarvagh, egh arazir aghuim me damu. Egh ia uan araziba deravɨra da tuisɨghɨva egh arazir aghuimɨn gɨn mangɨ.
